title: Remote Experimentation and Collaborative Learning Process for IoT Learning and Development

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental programming knowledge and understanding of network concepts
context.additional_context: Conducted in smartphone-based limited-technology environments, aiming to enhance workplace competencies for in-service professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the basic operating principles of IoT sensors and devices and write simple interaction code.
Learners can implement a communication model that integrates data collected in edge computing environments with cloud management systems.
Learners can design IoT data processing and visualization models to derive key performance indicators.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
